title: Caprese Stuffed Avocados
directions: Cut avocados in half and remove pits
Scoop out slight amount of flesh to create larger cavity
Chop removed avocado and mix with tomatoes, mozzarella, basil
Stuff mixture back into avocado halves
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil
Season with salt and pepper
Serve immediately

title: Vegetarian Lentil Curry
directions: Rinse lentils thoroughly
Heat coconut oil in large pot over medium heat
Sauté onion until translucent, about 5 minutes
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute
Stir in curry powder and cook until fragrant
Add lentils, coconut milk, and vegetable broth
Bring to boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25 minutes
Stir in spinach and cook until wilted
Season with salt and serve over rice

title: Mushroom and Spinach Quesadillas
directions: Heat olive oil in skillet over medium heat
Sauté onions and mushrooms until softened
Add spinach and cook until wilted
Stir in cumin and chili powder
Place tortillas on clean surface
Spread vegetable mixture on half of each tortilla
Sprinkle cheese over vegetables
Fold tortillas over and press gently
Cook in skillet until golden brown on both sides
Serve with sour cream

title: Keto Bacon Cheeseburger Casserole
directions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C)
Brown ground beef with onion in skillet
Drain excess fat and transfer to baking dish
In bowl, whisk eggs, heavy cream, and mayonnaise
Stir in cheese, garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Pour egg mixture over ground beef
Top with crumbled bacon
Bake for 25-30 minutes until set
Let cool for 5 minutes before serving

title: Keto Garlic Butter Salmon
directions: Pat salmon fillets dry and season with salt and pepper
Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook salmon skin-side up for 4-5 minutes
Flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes
Remove salmon from skillet
Reduce heat to medium and melt butter
Add garlic and cook until fragrant
Stir in lemon juice and parsley
Return salmon to skillet and spoon sauce over
Serve with steamed asparagus

title: Keto Cauliflower Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 1 large head cauliflower, cut into florets
directions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Steam cauliflower florets until tender-crisp
In saucepan, melt butter and cream cheese over low heat
Whisk in heavy cream until smooth
Stir in 1 1/2 cups cheddar cheese until melted
Add garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper
Combine cheese sauce with cauliflower in baking dish
Top with remaining cheddar cheese
Bake for 15-20 minutes until bubbly
Broil for 2-3 minutes for golden top

title: Gluten-Free Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
directions: Slice chicken into thin strips
Mix soy sauce, honey, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger
Heat oil in wok or large skillet over high heat
Stir-fry chicken until cooked through, about 5-6 minutes
Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp
Pour sauce over chicken and vegetables
Mix cornstarch with water and add to thicken sauce
Simmer for 2 minutes until sauce thickens
Serve over cooked rice

title: Gluten-Free Quinoa Salad
directions: Rinse quinoa thoroughly under cold water
Bring water to boil in saucepan
Add quinoa, reduce heat, cover and simmer for 15 minutes
Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes
Fluff with fork and let cool completely
In large bowl, combine cooled quinoa with vegetables
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper
Pour dressing over salad and toss to combine
Stir in feta cheese and parsley
Chill for 30 minutes before serving

title: Gluten-Free Almond Flour Pancakes
directions: In large bowl, whisk together almond flour and baking powder
In separate bowl, beat eggs with almond milk, maple syrup, and vanilla
Combine wet and dry ingredients, mix until smooth
Let batter rest for 5 minutes
Heat butter in non-stick skillet over medium heat
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake
Cook until bubbles form on surface, about 2-3 minutes
Flip and cook until golden brown
Serve with fresh berries and additional maple syrup
